header.title: CosNotifyChannelAdmin_StructuredProxyPushConsumer

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotifyChannelAdmin::StructuredProxyPushConsumer interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: connect_structured_push_supplier(StructuredProxyPushConsumer, PushSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Connect a supplier to the proxy

desc.p: This operation connects a PushSupplier to the target object. If a connection already exists an exception is raised.

func.name: push_structured_event(StructuredProxyPushConsumer, StructuredEvent) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Push a structured event to the proxy

desc.p: When a client want to push a new event to the target object this operation must be used.

func.name: disconnect_structured_push_consumer(StructuredProxyPushConsumer) -> ok
func.fsummary: Close the connection and terminate the proxy

desc.p: This operation cause the target object to close the connection and terminate.
